item.title: Telangana: Urea shortage hits Kharif sowing in Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Telangana: Urea shortage hits Kharif sowing in Jogulamba Gadwal
Farmers in the district are facing severe delays in Kharif sowing due to urea shortage. Long queues were seen at PACS centres despite government claims of adequate supply. Farmers expressed anger over the delay and demanded immediate intervention to avoid disruption of agricultural operations.
By Telangana Today Published Date - 8 August 2025, 02:00 PM
Jogulamba Gadwal: With intermittent rains and canal releases raising hopes for...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
